references: Related: CF 214844, CF 214644, CF 214890. Amending: Ord 45382
summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 7, 8 and 9, Block 1, Admiral Way Addition; Lots 7 and 8, and vacated alley adjoining, Block 17, Wood's Supplement of Blocks 16 and 17, Burke's 2nd Addition; and Lots 1, 2, 3 and the north 15 feet of Lot 4, Block 3, Wassom's Addition to Ravenna Park; with respect to Use Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto one new section numbered 2-308.
